title: Public Github Repo Leaking Internal Credentials
content:
Summary:
In Github I found some credentials to use in a mesos.apache.org
Github:
https://github.com/Yelp/Tron/blob/master/yelp_package/itest_dockerfiles/mesos/mesos-secrets
https://github.com/Yelp/Tron/blob/master/yelp_package/itest_dockerfiles/mesos/mesos-slave-secret
POC ss
<image_0>
Login documentation https://mesos.apache.org
https://mesos.apache.org/documentation/latest/authentication/
Impact
Unauthorized account access /information disclosure
steps: Navigate to the public GitHub repository: https://github.com/Yelp/Tron
Locate and access the files containing credentials: /yelp_package/itest_dockerfiles/mesos/mesos-secrets and /yelp_package/itest_dockerfiles/mesos/mesos-slave-secret
vuln_description: The vulnerability involves the exposure of internal credentials in a public GitHub repository, specifically credentials for mesos.apache.org. This could lead to unauthorized account access and information disclosure.
reason: The discovery of this vulnerability is straightforward as it only requires accessing publicly available files in a GitHub repository. There are no complex interactions or states involved, and the credentials are plainly visible in the repository.
